description: Brandi Mae is a successful business Lady who has left the running of her company to her employees. Brandi wants to send a message to America on live TV to show them that being a lazy Bratty Asshole will end up fucking yourself. title: Cover Boss Reality TV Show Humilation for Bad Employee
